share on x jc jean hensley calton. jun 21 at 9:41 pm lit a candle in memory of ada marie stapleton. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x delisa williams. jun 21 at 9:00 pm so sorry for the loss of your mother. sending deepest condolences to you all. ada was a good woman, and like a mother to a lot of kids that grew up with her kids. miss you all, wish i could be there to say goodbye. keeping you all close in my prayers. robin, rodney, clark, and mark... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ab ann mc. gaha burleson. jun 21 at 8:31 pm lit a candle in memory of ada marie stapleton. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ab ann mc. gaha burleson/cousinjun 21 at 8:14 pm robin, rodney, mark and clark, i am so sorry for your loss. i pray for each of you, for god to give you strength and peace knowing that she is happy and healthy once again. she lives inside each of you so therefore she is never far away. may god comfort you all in this time of mourning. i have wonderful memories of her as i know you do. i love each and all of you. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x amy carter. jun 21 at 8:10 pm lit a candle in memory of ada marie stapleton. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ts tonya smith. jun 21 at 4:50 pm ada was a very loving person, and i really enjoyed talking to her she's going to be missed. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ha hamlett-dobson. jun 21 at 1:24 pm with our deepest sympathy. the staff at hamlett-dobson funeral home. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 23. 5:00 pm -
